00030 // Includes the TYPO3 module classe
00031 require_once( PATH_tslib . 'class.tslib_pibase.php' );
00032 
00033 /**
00034  * Abstract class for the TYPO3 frontend plugins
00035  *
00036  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00037  * @version     1.0
00038  * @package     TYPO3
00039  * @subpackage  oop
00040  */
00041 abstract class tx_oop_Plugin_Base extends tslib_pibase
00042 {
00043     /**
00044      * The method used to get the plugin content, which has to be declared
00045      * in the child classes
00046      */
00047     abstract protected function _getPluginContent( tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag $content );
00048     
00049     /**
00050      * A flag to know wether the needed static variables are set
00051      */
00052     private static $_hasStatic  = false;
00053     
00054     /**
00055      * The instance of the database object (tx_oop_Database_Layer)
00056      */
00057     protected static $_db       = NULL;
00058     
00059     /**
00060      * A reference to the t3lib_DB object
00061      */
00062     protected static $_t3Db     = NULL;
00063     
00064     /**
00065      * 
00066      */
00067     protected static $_t3Lang   = NULL;
00068     
00069     /**
00070      * A reference to the TCA description array
00071      */
00072     protected static $_tcaDescr = array();
00073     
00074     /**
00075      * A reference to the TCA array
00076      */
00077     protected static $_tca      = array();
00078     
00079     /**
00080      * A reference to the client informations array
00081      */
00082     protected static $client    = array();
00083     
00084     /**
00085      * A reference to the TYPO3 configuration variables array
00086      */
00087     protected static $_t3Conf   = array();
00088     
00089     /**
00090      * The ASCII new line character
00091      */
00092     protected static $_NL       = '';
00093     
00094     /**
00095      * The ASCII tabulation character
00096      */
00097     protected static $_TAB      = '';
00098     
00099     /**
00100      * 
00101      */
00102     protected $_lang            = NULL;
00103     
00104     /**
00105      * A reflection object for the backend module
00106      */
00107     private $_reflection        = NULL;
00108     
00109     /**
00110      * 
00111      */
00112     private $_content           = NULL;
00113     
00114     /**
00115      * The module number
00116      */
00117     private $_pluginNumber      = 0;
00118     
00119     /**
00120      * The name of the module (child) class
00121      */
00122     private $_pluginClass       = '';
00123     
00124     /**
00125      * 
00126      */
00127     private $_extKey            = '';
00128     
00129     /**
00130      * 
00131      */
00132     private $_extDir            = '';
00133     
00134     /**
00135      * 
00136      */
00137     private $_uploadDirectory   = '';
00138     
00139     /**
00140      * 
00141      */
00142     public function __construct()
00143     {
00144         $this->_pluginClass = get_class( $this );
00145         
00146         $this->_reflection = new ReflectionObject( $this );
00147         
00148         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00149             
00150             self::_setStaticVars();
00151         }
00152         
00153         $this->_pluginNumber  = substr( $this->_pluginClass, -1 );
00154         
00155         $extPathInfo = explode( DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $this->_reflection->getFileName() );
00156         
00157         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00158         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00159         
00160         $this->_extKey = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00161         
00162         $this->_extDir = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( $this->_extKey );
00163         
00164         $this->_uploadDirectory = str_replace(
00165             PATH_site,
00166             '',
00167             t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_' . str_replace( '_', '', $this->_extKey ) . '/' )
00168         );
00169         
00170         $this->_lang = tx_oop_Lang_Getter::getInstance( 'EXT:' . $this->_extKey . '/lang/pi' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.xml' );
00171         
00172         $this->_content = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00173     }
00174     
00175     /**
00176      * 
00177      */
00178     private static function _setStaticVars()
00179     {
00180         self::$_db        =  tx_oop_Database_Layer::getInstance();
00181         self::$_t3Db      =  $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_DB' ];
00182         self::$_t3Lang    =  $GLOBALS[ 'LANG' ];
00183         self::$_tcaDescr  =& $GLOBALS[ 'TCA_DESCR' ];
00184         self::$_tca       =& $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ];
00185         self::$client     =& $GLOBALS[ 'CLIENT' ];
00186         self::$_t3Conf    =& $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ];
00187         self::$_NL        =  chr( 10 );
00188         self::$_TAB       =  chr( 9 );
00189         self::$_hasStatic =  true;
00190     }
00191     
00192     /**
00193      * 
00194      */
00195     public function main()
00196     {
00197         return ( string )$this->_content;
00198     }
00199 }
